about_the_game:
Will you protect her… or will you be the next one needing help?

What seemed like the beginning of a perfect life together soon turns into a terrifying reality that feels impossible to control.

"My Sleeping Girlfriend" is a psychological horror game where you take on the role of a young man who, after moving in with his girlfriend, uncovers a dark secret: her seemingly harmless sleepwalking hides something truly terrifying.

Your Mission:

  • Search for her in the darkness of a house that feels more hostile with each passing night.

  • Observe her carefully—every step, every movement could be a warning… or a trap.

  • Make quick decisions to prevent something terrible from happening. Her safety is in your hands… but so is your own.

Nothing is what it seems, and your actions each night could mean the difference between a bad dream… and a true nightmare.

What will you do when the real horror isn’t her… but yourself?

⚠ Content Warning: This game contains violent scenes, disturbing images, and unsettling moments, which may not be suitable for all players.

content_descriptors.notes: Content Warning: This game contains violent scenes, disturbing images, and moments designed to unsettle, which may not be suitable for all players.
